content: I want to speak to a manager right now! No bots, no scripts. Get me someone in charge immediately.

Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. I understand you'd like to speak with a manager. Can you please share your name and a brief description of the issue so I can get you connected to the right person as quickly as possible?
I already said no bots! You aren’t listening. I want a human, now. This is ridiculous. Don’t ask me for my name, just transfer me.
I'm sorry for any frustration. I'll connect you with a human operator right away for further assistance.
reason: Customer explicitly demanded to speak to a human manager and refused to interact with the AI.
